title: Provides that two owners of real property may qualify for the persons with disabilities and limited incomes exemption if at least one person is disabled
summary: Provides that two owners of real property may qualify for the persons with disabilities and limited incomes exemption provided that at least one of such persons is disabled.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the partial exemption from real property taxation to persons with disabilities and limited incomes
